body: I thought the last one I read was bad but atleast it was wholesome, what even is happening in this? The artstyle is lazy and it's all over the place, I'm not usually one for futanari and definitely not in this case as it pulls so much shit out of its ass to create this blurry mess of a doujin. What kind of shitty plot is this too, she somehow has a dick one day and when trying to rub one out some girl just appears on her dick as she cums? The whole plot is based around that and it's so fucking weird. I don't judge doujins often but this is concerning.
I just hate those moments when you're masturbating and a woman just appears on your dick as you nut.
